page.title: 19CHILDREN'S GAMES/OWERMOIGNE
page.content: WE HAVE THREE FAVOURITE COMPUTER GAMES.IN{GHOSTBUSTERS}THE AIM IS TO TRAP GHOSTS SO THEY ARE UNABLE TO REACH THE TEMPLE OF ZOUL.IN{FRANTIC } {FREDDY}YOU HAVE TO PUT OUT FIRES WITHOUT BURNING ASH KILLING YOU, YOU HAVE TO GET CHILDREN OUT OF THE BEDROOM AND RIDE OFF IN A FIRE ENGINE. IN{FROG GAME}A FROG MUST JUMP OVER FLASHING LILY PADS AND A DOG KENNEL WHILST BEING CHASED BY DOGS.OUR FAVOURITE OUTDOOR GAMES ARE{ROUNDERS,} YOU HIT A BALL AND TRY TO RUN ROUND A SQUARE BEFORE THE BALL IS RETRIEVED. {FOOTBALL,}11 PLAYERS HAVE TO KICK A BALL INTO THE OTHER TEAMS GOAL AREA. {NETBALL,}PLAYED BY GIRLS,SEVEN PLAYERS THROW THE BALL TO EACH OTHER AND THEN INTO A 3 METRE HIGH ROUND HOOP. {BY CLASS 3 AT OWERMOIGNE SCHOOL }
